content:
TITLE: Markdown Version History Documentation DESCRIPTION: Structured changelog entries documenting versions, changes, and updates to the TailwindCSS framework. The changelog covers multiple version releases and updates including alpha releases. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### Added - Enable `focus`, `focus-within`, and `dark` variants (when enabled) for all ring utilities by default ([e0788ef](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/commit/879f088)) ## [2.0.0-alpha.15] - 2020-11-11 ### Added - Added `ring-inset` utility for rendering rings as inset shadows ([879f088](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/commit/879f088)) ### Changed - `ringWidth` utilities always reset ring styles to ensure no accidental variable inheritance through the cascade ([879f088](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/commit/879f088)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring TailwindCSS Version Updates DESCRIPTION: Release notes and version history for TailwindCSS, detailing bug fixes, new features, and breaking changes across versions 3.0.0-alpha.1 through recent releases. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ### Fixed - Improve `DEBUG` flag ([#6797](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6797), [#6804](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6804)) - Ensure we can use `<` and `>` characters in modifiers ([#6851](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6851)) - Validate `theme()` works in arbitrary values ([#6852](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6852)) - Properly detect `theme()` value usage in arbitrary properties ([#6854](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6854)) - Improve collapsing of duplicate declarations ([#6856](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6856)) - Remove support for `TAILWIND_MODE=watch` ([#6858](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/6858)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Tailwind CSS Version 3.4.2 Release DESCRIPTION: This snippet details the changelog for Tailwind CSS version 3.4.2, listing various bug fixes and improvements across different aspects of the framework. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ## [3.4.2] - 2024-03-27 ### Fixed - Ensure max specificity of `0,0,1` for button and input Preflight rules ([#12735](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/12735)) - Improve glob handling for folders with `(`, `)`, `[` or `]` in the file path ([#12715](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/12715)) - Split `:has` rules when using `experimental.optimizeUniversalDefaults` ([#12736](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/12736)) - Sort arbitrary properties alphabetically across multiple class lists ([#12911](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/12911)) - Add `mix-blend-plus-darker` utility ([#12923](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/12923)) - Ensure dashes are allowed in variant modifiers ([#13303](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13303)) - Fix crash showing completions in Intellisense when using a custom separator ([#13306](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13306)) - Transpile `import.meta.url` in config files ([#13322](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13322)) - Reset letter spacing for form elements ([#13150](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13150)) - Fix missing `xx-large` and remove double `x-large` absolute size ([#13324](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13324)) - Don't error when encountering nested CSS unless trying to `@apply` a class that uses nesting ([#13325](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13325)) - Ensure that arbitrary properties respect `important` configuration ([#13353](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13353)) - Change dark mode selector so `@apply` works correctly with pseudo elements ([#13379](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13379)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Fixed Issues in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: This snippet lists several bug fixes made in a recent Tailwind CSS update, including improvements to color definitions, class prefixing, and grid utilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ### Fixed - Make it possible to use multiple `` placeholders in a single color definition ([#13740](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13740)) - Don't prefix classes in arbitrary values of `has-*`, `group-has-*`, and `peer-has-*` variants ([#13770](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13770)) - Support negative values for `{col,row}-{start,end}` utilities ([#13781](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13781)) - Update embedded browserslist database ([#13792](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13792)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Documenting Tailwind CSS Version 3.4.3 Release DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows the changelog entry for Tailwind CSS version 3.4.3, which includes a revert to changes in glob handling. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` ## [3.4.3] - 2024-03-27 ### Fixed - Revert changes to glob handling ([#13384](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/pull/13384)) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using CSS Functions for Dynamic Utilities DESCRIPTION: Shows the usage of new CSS functions like --spacing(), --alpha(), and --theme() for creating dynamic utility values. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` .example { margin: --spacing(4); color: --alpha(blue, 50%); font-size: --theme(fontSize.lg); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Value and Modifier Functions in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Example showing support for literal values in the --value() and --modifier() functions in Tailwind CSS. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` --value('…') --modifier('…') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using @variant for Custom Variants in CSS DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the new @variant directive for creating custom variants directly in CSS. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` @variant { /* Custom variant rules go here */ } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the @config Directive in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: A directive that allows specifying a configuration file path directly in your CSS. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @config ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable Theme Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing usage of CSS variables in theme references. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` --width-1\/2 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Razor Syntax Pattern in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Example showing interpretation of special Razor syntax for Tailwind CSS classes. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: razor CODE: ``` @("@")md:… ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring TailwindCSS Config File DESCRIPTION: Example of initializing a TailwindCSS config file with the full configuration template. Shows how to scaffold a new tailwind.config.js file. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` tailwindcss init --full ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the 'watch=always' CLI Option in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Command-line option that prevents Tailwind CSS CLI from exiting when stdin closes, useful for continuous watching of files. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` --watch=always ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: JavaScript Theme Reference Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to reference CSS theme variables with special characters in the theme function. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` theme('width.1/2') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Import Path Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing the new relative path syntax requirement for CSS imports in TailwindCSS v4. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` @import './styles.css' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Escaping Special Characters in Theme Namespace Syntax DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to escape special characters like asterisks in theme namespace syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` --color-\*: initial; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Brace Expansion Pattern in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Example showing brace expansion patterns used in Tailwind CSS for ranges and steps. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` {10..0..5} {0..10..-5} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Ruby Class Detection Syntax DESCRIPTION: Example showing Ruby's %w syntax pattern for class detection in Slim templates. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: ruby CODE: ``` %w ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Supported File Extensions for TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: This snippet provides a categorized list of file extensions that are likely supported or relevant to the TailwindCSS project. It covers various web technologies, templating languages, and programming languages. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/template-extensions.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # HTML html pug # Glimmer gjs gts # JS astro cjs cts jade js jsx mjs mts svelte ts tsx vue # Markdown md mdx # ASP aspx razor # Handlebars handlebars hbs mustache # PHP php twig # Ruby erb haml liquid rb rhtml slim # Elixir / Phoenix eex heex # Nunjucks njk nunjucks # Python py tpl # Rust rs ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Preprocessor Extensions DESCRIPTION: Common file extensions used for CSS preprocessor source files - .less for Less, .sass and .scss for Sass/SCSS, and .styl for Stylus. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/ignored-extensions.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: text CODE: ``` less lock sass scss styl ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Common Repository Configuration Files List DESCRIPTION: List of dependency lock files and Git ignore configuration commonly found in JavaScript/Node.js projects. Includes lock files for npm, pnpm and bun package managers, plus Git ignore settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/ignored-files.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` package-lock.json pnpm-lock.yaml bun.lockb .gitignore ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered paragraph containing various project badges for Tailwind CSS. It includes badges for build status, total downloads, latest release, and license information, linking to relevant resources. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet demonstrates how to display various project badges for Tailwind CSS, including build status, download count, latest release version, and license information. It uses shield.io badges linked to relevant GitHub and npm pages. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet shows various status badges for the Tailwind CSS project, including build status, total downloads, latest release version, and license information. It uses shield.io badges linked to relevant project resources. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-node/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet shows a series of status badges for the Tailwind CSS project, including build status, total downloads, latest release version, and license information. Each badge is linked to its respective source of information. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-browser/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Status Badges Implementation in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML code for displaying project status badges including build status, download count, version, and license information using shield.io badges. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-upgrade/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Description and Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates centered paragraphs containing the project description and status badges. It includes links to the project's GitHub actions, npm package, releases, and license. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-postcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered logo for Tailwind CSS with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet shows how to display the Tailwind CSS logo with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet displays the Tailwind CSS logo with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-node/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Logo and Badge Implementation for Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying the Tailwind CSS logo with dark/light mode support and project status badges including build status, downloads, version and license information. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-cli/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet showcases the Tailwind CSS logo using a responsive image setup that supports dark and light color schemes. It uses the element with multiple tags to provide different logo versions based on user preferences. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-browser/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered logo for Tailwind CSS with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different image sources based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-postcss/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Advanced Directory Traversal with WalkBuilder DESCRIPTION: Shows advanced usage of the ignore crate using WalkBuilder to customize traversal behavior, specifically enabling hidden file traversal. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: rust CODE: ``` use ignore::WalkBuilder; for result in WalkBuilder::new("./").hidden(false).build() { println!("{:?}", result); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Directory Traversal with Ignore Crate DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates basic recursive directory traversal using the ignore crate's Walk iterator. Automatically filters files based on .ignore and .gitignore patterns. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: rust CODE: ``` use ignore::Walk; for result in Walk::new("./") { // Each item yielded by the iterator is either a directory entry or an // error, so either print the path or the error. match result { Ok(entry) => println!("{}", entry.path().display()), Err(err) => println!("ERROR: {}", err), } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Ignore Crate Dependency in Cargo.toml DESCRIPTION: Shows how to add the ignore crate as a dependency in a Rust project's Cargo.toml file. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: toml CODE: ``` [dependencies] ignore = "0.4" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Next.js Development Server DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Next.js development server using different package managers. Supports npm, yarn, pnpm, and bun. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/playgrounds/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run dev # or yarn dev # or pnpm dev # or bun dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: HTML Logo and Badge Implementation DESCRIPTION: HTML markup for displaying the Tailwind CSS logo with dark/light mode support and project status badges using center-aligned paragraphs. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-vite/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Property Usage DESCRIPTION: Example showing CSS property usage for word wrapping across browsers. Uses both word-wrap and overflow-wrap properties for IE compatibility. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` word-wrap: break-word; overflow-wrap: break-word; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Version Comparison Links for TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive list of markdown-formatted links that compare different versions of TailwindCSS on GitHub. Each link shows the changes between consecutive versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [2.2.19]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v2.2.18...v2.2.19 [2.2.18]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v2.2.17...v2.2.18 [2.2.17]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v2.2.16...v2.2.17 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Name Reference - TailwindCSS Oxide Darwin DESCRIPTION: Reference to the TailwindCSS Oxide package name specifically for x86_64 macOS (Darwin) architecture SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/darwin-x64/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-darwin-x64 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Responsive Logo Implementation in HTML DESCRIPTION: HTML code for displaying the Tailwind CSS logo with dark/light mode support using the picture element and multiple sources based on color scheme preferences. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-upgrade/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Apple Silicon in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary specifically compiled for ARM64 architecture on macOS (Apple Silicon). It uses a code block to highlight the package name. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/darwin-arm64/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-darwin-arm64` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Windows Binary in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the package name for the Windows x64 binary of Tailwind CSS Oxide. It uses a code block to highlight the package name and provides additional details about the binary's target architecture. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/win32-x64-msvc/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-win32-x64-msvc` This is the **x86_64-pc-windows-msvc** binary for `@tailwindcss/oxide` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Windows ARM64 DESCRIPTION: This snippet identifies the specific binary version of @tailwindcss/oxide for the arm64-pc-windows-msvc architecture. It's crucial for users who need to run Tailwind CSS on Windows ARM64 systems. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/win32-arm64-msvc/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-win32-arm64-msvc` This is the **arm64-pc-windows-msvc** binary for `@tailwindcss/oxide` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Name Definition in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Displays the NPM package name for the Linux-specific Tailwind CSS Oxide binary distribution using code formatting. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-x64-musl/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-linux-x64-musl ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Name Reference for Tailwind CSS Oxide ARM64 DESCRIPTION: Reference to the NPM package name for the ARM64 GNU Linux binary distribution of Tailwind CSS Oxide. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm64-gnu/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm64-gnu ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Linux ARM64 (MUSL) in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the name of the npm package for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary targeting the aarch64-unknown-linux-musl platform. It uses a code block to highlight the package name. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm64-musl/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm64-musl` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Name Reference - Tailwind CSS Oxide Android ARM64 DESCRIPTION: Package name identifier for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary targeting Android ARM64 architecture (aarch64-linux-android). SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/android-arm64/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-android-arm64 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing TailwindCSS Oxide Package for Android ARM DESCRIPTION: Package name reference for the TailwindCSS Oxide binary built for Android ARM (armv7-linux-android-eabi) architecture. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/android-arm-eabi/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-android-arm-eabi ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Identifying FreeBSD x64 Binary for Tailwind CSS Oxide in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This snippet uses Markdown to specify the package name and describe the binary architecture for the Tailwind CSS Oxide project targeted at FreeBSD x64 systems. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/freebsd-x64/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-freebsd-x64` This is the **x86_64-unknown-freebsd** binary for `@tailwindcss/oxide` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tailwind CSS Oxide WASM Package Name DESCRIPTION: Package name identifier for the WebAssembly binary implementation of Tailwind CSS Oxide targeting wasm32-wasip1-threads platform. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/wasm32-wasi/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-wasm32-wasi ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Package Name Definition in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Package name declaration for the ARM Linux GNU EABI hard-float binary of Tailwind CSS Oxide SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm-gnueabihf/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` @tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm-gnueabihf ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Linux x64 GNU Package in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown heading and description defining the @tailwindcss/oxide-linux-x64-gnu package and specifying its target architecture as x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-x64-gnu/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-x64-gnu` This is the **x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu** binary for `@tailwindcss/oxide` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Gitignore for TailwindCSS Project DESCRIPTION: This gitignore configuration specifies two entries to be ignored by Git version control: the .git directory and the node_modules folder. These exclusions are typical in web development projects to avoid tracking unnecessary files. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss.git/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/ignored-content-dirs.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: gitignore CODE: ``` .git node_modules ```
